the treatment protocol for children already infected with measles, and supplementation during 
mass measles vaccination campaigns provides protection against further VAD and the severity of 
potential measles infection (see section on vitamin A).
Breastfeeding and appropriate complementary feeding should also continue to be promoted 
actively. The multiple micronutrient supplements should be given until the emergency is over and 
access to nutrient-rich foods is restored.
